item.title: References: Statement of Purpose
item.description:
1. Varun Sundar, Salman Siddique and Kaushik Mitra, “A Unified Framework for Lensless Image Recovery”, to be submitted in the IEEE Transactions on Computational Imaging 2020.

  2. The 9th HULT Prize, Singapore. Held at Nanyang Technology University (NTU), Singapore,16th to 18th March 2018.

  3. H Drew and M Christopher. GQA: A New Dataset for Real-World Visual Reasoning and Compositional Question Answering. In Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2019.

  4. Varun Sundar, Arka Sadhu and Ram Nevatia, “FARCNN: Decoupling attributes from object detection”, Viterbi-IUSSTF (Indo US Science and Technology Forum) REU Symposium, July 2019.

  5. Yicheng Wu, Vivek Boominathan, Huaijin Chen, Aswin C. Sankaranarayanan, and Ashok Veeraraghavan. Phasecam3d — Learning phase masks for passive single view depth estimation. In IEEE Intl. Conf. Computational Photography (ICCP), 2019.

  6. Achuta Kadambi, Vage Taamazyan, Boxin Shi, and Ramesh Raskar. Polarized 3d: High-quality depth sensing with polarization cues. In International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2015.

  7. Blog Post on extending LSD SLAM.

  8. Centre for Innovation, IIT Madras.

  9. Tobias Gruber, Frank D. Julca-Aguilar, Mario Bijelic, Werner Ritter, Klaus Dietmayer, and Felix Heide. Gated2depth: Real-time dense lidar from gated images. CoRR, abs/1902.04997, 2019.

  5. A Kadambi and R Raskar. Rethinking Machine Vision Time of Flight With GHz Heterodyning. In IEEE Access, 2017.
